item.title: Plugin install without FTP Credentials
item.description: Normal behavior of Wordpress when installing plugin is to ask for FTP credentials. So to fix the problem, just add this line to wp-config.php (of course, make sure permission are fine). define('FS_METHOD','direct'); More troubleshooting details in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/questions/wordpress-asking-for-ftp-credentials
